title: I NEED HELP, PLEASE HELP. Launch Button Wont Work
body: So when I open league it comes to the regular launch page, with patch number, champ rotation, all the good stuff. But when I click launch the button goes grey, like normal but it stays grey for 30 seconds and then the button goes orange again. No matter how many  times I try it keeps doing that, I uninstalled league nd installed multiple times but it does nothing. If any riot members or people can help me please do, its really frustrating

replies.body:
I have the same problem too 
Which step did you use to fix it?

This issue in particular often occurs if you have a poor or unstable connection to the servers. You should be able to resolve this by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which covers steps that commonly fix these issues.

Let me know if this caused any change.
It did thank you so much
